project_descr: The project will provide technical assistance and build capacities of the Public Authority for Disabled Affairs (PADA), as part of its Strategic Plan to assist persons with disabilities to access appropriate resources to become active partners in society

outputs.output_descr: PAD project will provide technical assistance to the Public Authority for Disabled Affairs PAD, as part of its Strategic Plan to assist persons with disabilities to access appropriate resources to become active partners in society

project_title: achieving kuwait 2035 vision towards persons with disabi
